tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  completion_date DATE,
  assessment_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    impact_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE development_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT,
    budget DECIMAL,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Project (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_rating INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_project FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_id INT,
  assessor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  assessment_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_impact FOREIGN KEY (impact_id) REFERENCES EnvironmentalImpact(impact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  impact_type VARCHAR(255),
  impact_description TEXT,
  risk_level INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessor VARCHAR(255),
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_plan (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalAssessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    lead_consultant VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactTypes (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_type VARCHAR(255),
    project_status VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Consultants (
    consultant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consultant_name VARCHAR(255),
    expertise_area VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Assessors (
    assessor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessor_name VARCHAR(255),
    expertise_area VARCHAR(255),
    assessor_type VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
)
